data.content:
Ekko (Star Guardian Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 12, 2019

Ekko, the boy genius from Zaun, has joined the ranks of the Star Guardians with his dazzling new skin, Star Guardian Ekko. This skin transforms Ekko into a celestial warrior, ready to protect the universe from evil forces. With its vibrant colors and cosmic effects, Star Guardian Ekko is a must-have for any fan of the Star Guardian skin line.

Star Guardian Ekko features a complete visual overhaul, giving Ekko a magical and otherworldly appearance. His usual street clothes are replaced with a sleek, futuristic outfit adorned with starry patterns. His hair is styled in a vibrant shade of blue, matching the theme of the skin. The most striking feature of Star Guardian Ekko is his weapon, a glowing staff that crackles with cosmic energy. This staff not only looks amazing but also adds a unique touch to Ekko's abilities.

In addition to the visual changes, Star Guardian Ekko also comes with new animations and sound effects. His recall animation shows him summoning a portal to the stars, disappearing into it before reappearing in a burst of stardust. The sound effects for his abilities have been modified to match the cosmic theme, creating a truly immersive experience.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Star Guardian Ekko. In the alternate universe of the Star Guardians, Ekko is a brilliant young inventor who has harnessed the power of the stars. He joins the Star Guardians to protect the universe from the dark forces that threaten to consume it. With his quick thinking and time-manipulating abilities, Ekko is a valuable asset to the team.

Ekko's strengths lie in his ability to manipulate time and outmaneuver his opponents. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy champion. This makes him a formidable duelist, especially in prolonged fights. His Q ability, Timewinder, throws a device that deals damage to enemies in its path and then returns to Ekko, damaging enemies again. This ability can be used to poke enemies from a safe distance or to engage in close-quarters combat. Ekko's W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a field that slows enemies and, after a delay, stuns them. This ability is perfect for setting up ganks or turning the tide of team fights. His E ability, Phase Dive, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking back to his original location. This ability gives Ekko incredible mobility and allows him to quickly reposition himself in fights. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, allows him to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies. This ability can be a game-changer, allowing Ekko to escape certain death or turn a losing fight into a victory.

Despite his strengths, Ekko also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to some other champions. This means that he excels in burst damage but may struggle in prolonged fights. Additionally, Ekko's abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Players must be able to predict their opponents' movements and make split-second decisions to fully utilize Ekko's kit.

In the world of League of Legends, Ekko has a rich backstory. Hailing from the undercity of Zaun, Ekko grew up in poverty and was forced to fend for himself. However, his intelligence and resourcefulness allowed him to survive and even thrive in this harsh environment. Ekko's defining feature is his ability to manipulate time, a power he gained from a stolen device called the Z-Drive. With this power, Ekko can rewind time, giving him a unique advantage in battles.

Ekko's place in the game is that of an assassin and skirmisher. He excels at diving into the backline and eliminating high-priority targets. His time-manipulating abilities make him slippery and hard to catch, allowing him to outplay his opponents. Ekko's versatility also makes him a popular pick in both solo queue and professional play. He can be played in multiple roles, including mid lane and jungle, and has the potential to carry games if played correctly.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Ekko's various appearances in the game. From his classic skin to his other alternate skins, such as True Damage Ekko and PROJECT: Ekko, you can explore the different looks and playstyles of this fascinating champion. Whether you're a fan of his time-manipulating abilities or simply enjoy his engaging lore, Ekko is a champion that offers a unique and thrilling gameplay experience.

Ekko (Prestige Star Guardian Ekko)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points

Release Date: September 2021

League of Legends is known for its diverse and captivating skins, and the Prestige Star Guardian Ekko skin is no exception. This stunning skin was released in September 2021 and is available for purchase with 100 Prestige Points. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Ekko's Prestige Star Guardian skin and explore all the intricate details of this costume.

The Prestige Star Guardian Ekko skin takes the mischievous and time-bending champion to a whole new level. Ekko, known for his street-smart attitude and ability to manipulate time, joins the prestigious Star Guardian line-up, donning a celestial outfit that perfectly complements his unique abilities.

The skin features Ekko in a sleek white and gold armor, adorned with intricate celestial patterns. His hair is styled in a vibrant shade of blue, matching the color scheme of the Star Guardian theme. The costume also includes a pair of elegant wings, which symbolize Ekko's newfound connection to the cosmic forces. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, with every aspect meticulously designed to capture the essence of the Star Guardian universe.

As Ekko dashes through time and space, his abilities receive a stunning visual overhaul. His Q ability, Timewinder, transforms into a sparkling orb of celestial energy, leaving a trail of stardust in its wake. When Ekko activates his W ability, Parallel Convergence, a dazzling starry portal appears, ready to trap unsuspecting enemies. His E ability, Phase Dive, is accompanied by a burst of cosmic energy, leaving a trail of twinkling stars as he blinks through the battlefield. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, is enhanced with a breathtaking cosmic explosion, leaving enemies in awe of his power.

Now that we have explored the mesmerizing details of the Prestige Star Guardian Ekko skin, let's take a moment to delve into Ekko's story and his place in the League of Legends universe.

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a champion with a troubled past. Hailing from the city of Zaun, Ekko grew up in the harsh environment of the undercity, where survival was a constant struggle. Despite the odds stacked against him, Ekko's ingenuity and resourcefulness allowed him to thrive in this unforgiving world.

Ekko's unique ability to manipulate time became his greatest asset. Armed with his homemade invention, the Z-Drive, Ekko can rewind time, granting him the ability to undo mistakes and outmaneuver his opponents. With his street-smart attitude and a desire to protect the innocent, Ekko became a vigilante, using his powers to fight against the oppressive forces of Zaun.

In the League of Legends game, Ekko is a versatile champion who excels in both solo lanes and the jungle. His kit revolves around his ability to manipulate time, allowing him to engage and disengage with ease. Ekko's passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, deals bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy champion. This ability rewards players who can effectively chain their abilities together.

His Q ability, Timewinder, sends out a boomerang-like projectile that deals damage to enemies hit on both the outward and return path. This ability can be used to poke enemies from a distance or clear waves of minions. Ekko's W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a zone that slows enemies and, after a short delay, stuns them. This ability is a powerful tool for crowd control and setting up plays.

Ekko's E ability, Phase Dive, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking to his target location. This ability provides Ekko with mobility and allows him to quickly engage or escape from fights. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, allows Ekko to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies. This ability can turn the tide of a team fight and is a key component of Ekko's kit.

Ekko's strengths lie in his ability to burst down squishy targets and his exceptional mobility. His time-manipulating abilities make him a slippery champion to catch, and his burst damage can quickly eliminate priority targets. However, Ekko's weaknesses lie in his squishiness and reliance on landing skillshots. If caught out of position or unable to land his abilities, Ekko can be easily taken down by coordinated teams.

In conclusion, the Prestige Star Guardian Ekko skin offers players a chance to experience Ekko's time-bending abilities in a whole new light. With its stunning visuals and intricate design, this skin is a must-have for any Ekko enthusiast. Whether you're a fan of the Star Guardian universe or simply appreciate the artistry behind League of Legends skins, the Prestige Star Guardian Ekko skin is a true masterpiece.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Ekko's appearances, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this captivating champion.

Ekko: The Boy Who Shattered Time

Release Date: May 28, 2015

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a highly versatile champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique time-manipulating abilities, Ekko brings a fresh and exciting playstyle to the game. In this article, we will delve into Ekko's captivating story, explore his strengths and weaknesses, discuss his background in the game, and highlight his significant role in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Ekko

Ekko's tale begins in the city of Zaun, a dark and chaotic place filled with crime and corruption. Born into poverty, Ekko had to fend for himself from a young age. Despite the hardships he faced, Ekko possessed an innate intelligence and resourcefulness that set him apart from his peers.

One fateful day, Ekko stumbled upon a mysterious device known as the

This device allowed him to manipulate time, granting him the power to rewind and alter events. With this newfound ability, Ekko saw an opportunity to change the course of his own life and the lives of those around him.

As Ekko honed his time-manipulating skills, he became a vigilante, using his powers to fight against the injustices of Zaun. He became a symbol of hope for the oppressed, a beacon of light in the darkness. Ekko's actions caught the attention of the esteemed organization known as the League of Legends, who recognized his potential and invited him to join their ranks.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Ekko's kit is designed to be highly versatile, allowing players to adapt to various situations. His primary role is that of an assassin, capable of bursting down squishy targets with his high burst damage. However, Ekko also possesses decent crowd control and survivability, making him a formidable champion in team fights.

One of Ekko's greatest strengths is his ability to manipulate time with his ultimate ability, Chronobreak. This ability allows him to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to enemies in the area. Chronobreak can be a game-changer, allowing Ekko to turn the tides of a team fight or escape from dangerous situations.

Additionally, Ekko's passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, provides him with bonus damage on his basic attacks and spells after landing three hits on an enemy. This passive synergizes well with his other abilities, amplifying his burst potential.

However, Ekko does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to some other champions. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Players must carefully manage Ekko's resources and cooldowns to ensure they make the most out of his time-manipulating abilities.

Ekko's Background in the Game

Ekko was released on May 28, 2015, as a champion in League of Legends. Since his release, he has become a fan-favorite due to his unique playstyle and engaging lore. Ekko's time-manipulating abilities make him a challenging champion to master, but also a rewarding one for those who put in the effort.

In the game, Ekko is primarily played in the mid lane or jungle role. His burst damage and mobility make him a potent assassin, capable of quickly eliminating priority targets. Ekko's ability to control team fights with his crowd control and ultimate ability makes him a valuable asset to any team composition.

Furthermore, Ekko has received several skins over the years, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist to the champion. Players can access information and videos of all Ekko skins on this page, allowing them to explore the various cosmetic options available for this time-bending champion.

Conclusion

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, brings a captivating story and a versatile playstyle to the world of League of Legends. With his time-manipulating abilities, Ekko offers players a unique and exciting gameplay experience. Whether you're looking to burst down enemies with his high damage or outmaneuver opponents with his mobility, Ekko is a champion that demands skill and strategy.

As you explore Ekko's story and his place in the game, don't forget to check out the various skins available for this champion. Each skin offers a fresh visual experience, allowing you to customize Ekko's appearance to your liking.

So, embrace the power of time and join Ekko on his journey to reshape the future in the League of Legends!

Ekko (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

The

skin for Ekko is the original appearance of the champion when he was first introduced to the League of Legends game. This skin does not require any additional purchase or unlock, as it is the default look that players start with when selecting Ekko as their champion. While there are numerous other skins available for Ekko, each with its own unique theme and visual effects, the default skin remains a classic and iconic representation of the champion.

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a highly versatile champion known for his ability to manipulate time and space. With his unique skill set and playstyle, Ekko has become a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His default skin perfectly captures his youthful and rebellious nature, showcasing his street-smart style and his signature weapon, the Z-Drive Resonance.

The default skin features Ekko wearing a futuristic, urban-inspired outfit. He dons a red hoodie with a white t-shirt underneath, paired with baggy jeans and high-top sneakers. Ekko's hair is styled in a messy, spiked manner, reflecting his carefree and adventurous personality. The Z-Drive Resonance, a device strapped to his right arm, is a key component of his time-manipulating abilities.

In terms of visual effects, the default skin for Ekko showcases his time-bending abilities through various animations and particle effects. When using his abilities, Ekko leaves behind a trail of shimmering blue particles, symbolizing the manipulation of time. His ultimate ability, Chronobreak, creates a stunning visual display as Ekko shatters the timeline, leaving a trail of fractured reality in his wake.

Now, let's delve into the story of Ekko and his place in the League of Legends universe. Ekko hails from the city of Zaun, a dark and gritty metropolis filled with crime and corruption. Growing up in the streets, Ekko learned to fend for himself and developed a knack for tinkering with technology. His encounter with a stolen time-manipulation device, the Z-Drive, changed his life forever.

With the power to manipulate time at his disposal, Ekko became a vigilante, using his abilities to fight against injustice and protect the innocent. He became a symbol of hope for the people of Zaun, a beacon of light in the midst of darkness. Ekko's story is one of resilience and determination, as he strives to make a difference in a world plagued by chaos.

In the game, Ekko is classified as an assassin and a skirmisher, excelling in hit-and-run tactics and high mobility. His abilities allow him to engage and disengage fights with ease, making him a formidable opponent in both solo and team fights. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, deals bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy champion, rewarding players for well-timed combos.

Ekko's strengths lie in his ability to outmaneuver opponents and surprise them with burst damage. His Q ability, Timewinder, throws a device that deals damage and slows enemies, while also returning to Ekko after a short delay, allowing for strategic positioning and zoning. His W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a field that stuns enemies caught inside, providing crowd control and setup for his other abilities.

However, Ekko also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to some other assassins. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Players must carefully manage Ekko's ultimate ability, Chronobreak, as mistimed or reckless usage can leave him vulnerable and without an escape option.

In conclusion, the default skin for Ekko captures the essence of the champion's character and abilities. It showcases his rebellious nature and his mastery over time manipulation. While there are other visually stunning skins available for Ekko, the default skin remains a timeless representation of the champion. Whether you prefer the classic look or enjoy experimenting with different skins, Ekko offers a thrilling and unique gameplay experience.

For more information about Ekko and to explore his various appearances and abilities, you can visit the official League of Legends website or watch gameplay videos on platforms such as YouTube and Twitch. Ekko's story and gameplay are sure to captivate both new and experienced players alike, as they dive into the world of time-bending adventures and thrilling skirmishes.

Ekko (Sandstorm Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: May 27, 2015

Ekko, the boy who shattered time, has always been a fan-favorite champion in League of Legends. With his unique time-manipulating abilities and charismatic personality, Ekko has captured the hearts of players around the world. One of the many ways Riot Games has celebrated Ekko's popularity is by releasing a variety of skins for him, each with its own unique theme and visual effects. One such skin is

which offers a desert-inspired twist to Ekko's appearance.

Sandstorm Ekko, priced at 1350 RP, was released on May 27, 2015. This skin takes Ekko's base design and transforms it into a desert-themed outfit, complete with sand-colored clothing and a sandstorm-infused time device. The skin also features new visual effects, animations, and sound effects that perfectly complement the theme.

When playing as Sandstorm Ekko, you'll notice the sand particles swirling around him as he moves, creating a dynamic and immersive experience. His abilities also receive a makeover, with sand-themed effects that add an extra layer of visual appeal to his time-manipulating powers. From his Q ability, Timewinder, to his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, every spell showcases the desert theme in a stunning way.

But the Sandstorm Ekko skin is not just about visual enhancements. It also adds a touch of personality to Ekko's character. With this skin, Ekko becomes a desert wanderer, a survivor of the harsh conditions of the desert. His voice lines and interactions reflect this new persona, giving players a fresh experience when playing as Sandstorm Ekko.

Now, let's take a step back and delve into the story of Ekko himself. Ekko, also known as The Boy Who Shattered Time, hails from the city of Zaun, a place filled with crime and corruption. Growing up in the underbelly of Zaun, Ekko learned to fend for himself and developed a knack for tinkering with technology.

Ekko's unique ability to manipulate time emerged when he stumbled upon an ancient device known as the Z-Drive. With this newfound power, Ekko became a vigilante, using his time-manipulating abilities to right the wrongs of Zaun and protect the innocent. He quickly gained a reputation as a skilled fighter and a force to be reckoned with.

In the game, Ekko is classified as an assassin, excelling at burst damage and mobility. His kit revolves around his ability to manipulate time, allowing him to rewind and reposition himself during fights. This makes him a highly versatile champion, capable of outplaying opponents and turning the tide of battles.

However, like any champion, Ekko also has his weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on scaling and itemization to reach his full potential. Additionally, his time-manipulating abilities require precise timing and positioning, making him more difficult to master compared to some other champions.

Despite these challenges, Ekko has found his place in the game as a high-risk, high-reward champion. Skilled Ekko players can make incredible plays, baiting enemies into unfavorable situations and turning the tables with a well-timed ultimate. His flashy abilities and unique playstyle make him a favorite pick for many players, both in casual matches and professional play.

If you're interested in exploring all the appearances of Ekko, including the Sandstorm Ekko skin, you're in luck. On this page, you can find detailed information, images, and videos showcasing all of Ekko's skins. Whether you prefer the futuristic vibes of True Damage Ekko or the classic look of Base Ekko, there's a skin for every taste and playstyle.

So, whether you're a fan of Ekko's time-manipulating abilities or simply appreciate his charismatic personality, the Sandstorm Ekko skin offers a unique and visually stunning way to experience this beloved champion. Embrace the desert wanderer persona and let the sandstorms guide you to victory!

Ekko (Pulsefire Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: May 28, 2020

League of Legends is known for its diverse and visually stunning skins, and one of the most exciting additions to the game is the

skin. This futuristic skin transforms the young prodigy Ekko into a time-traveling hero from an alternate universe. With its sleek design and high-tech animations, Pulsefire Ekko offers players a unique and immersive experience.

The Pulsefire Ekko skin was released on May 28, 2020, and quickly became a fan favorite. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Ekko, including new particle effects, animations, and voice lines. It truly captures the essence of a time-traveling hero, with its futuristic aesthetics and attention to detail.

When it comes to the visual aspects of the Pulsefire Ekko skin, players are in for a treat. Ekko's base model is transformed into a sleek, cybernetic suit that glows with pulsating energy. His hair is replaced with a futuristic helmet, and his weapon, the Z-Drive, is upgraded with advanced technology. The skin also features unique recall animations, where Ekko disappears into a time portal before reappearing in a burst of energy.

One of the standout features of the Pulsefire Ekko skin is its stunning particle effects. Ekko's abilities are enhanced with futuristic energy, creating a visually striking display of power. From his Time Winder ability to his Parallel Convergence stun, each ability showcases the skin's high-tech theme. The ultimate ability, Chronobreak, is particularly impressive, as Ekko travels through time in a burst of energy, leaving a trail of futuristic particles in his wake.

In addition to the visual upgrades, Pulsefire Ekko also features new voice lines and interactions. Ekko's voice is altered to sound more robotic and futuristic, adding to the immersion of the skin. The skin also includes unique taunts, jokes, and interactions with other champions, further enhancing the player's experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Ekko and his place in the League of Legends universe. Ekko, also known as The Boy Who Shattered Time, is a young inventor from the city of Zaun. With his homemade device, the Z-Drive, Ekko can manipulate time, allowing him to rewind and alter events. He uses his abilities to outsmart his opponents and fight for a better future.

Ekko's strengths lie in his ability to control time and manipulate his surroundings. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage and gain movement speed after landing a basic attack or hitting an enemy with an ability. This makes him a formidable duelist and skirmisher, capable of quickly dispatching his opponents.

His Q ability, Timewinder, sends out a device that deals damage to enemies it passes through and slows them. If Ekko picks up the device, it refunds mana and reduces the cooldown, encouraging strategic positioning and timing. His W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a field that slows enemies and, after a delay, stuns them. This ability can be used to set up devastating combos and turn the tide of team fights.

Ekko's E ability, Phase Dive, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking back to his original location. This ability provides mobility and allows Ekko to quickly engage or disengage from fights. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, allows him to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies. This ability can be a game-changer, allowing Ekko to turn the tables and escape from dangerous situations.

In the world of League of Legends, Ekko is a versatile champion who can be played in multiple roles. He is primarily seen in the mid lane, where his burst damage and mobility make him a formidable assassin. However, he can also be played in the top lane or jungle, thanks to his ability to sustain and outplay his opponents.

Overall, Ekko's Pulsefire skin is a must-have for fans of the champion. Its futuristic design, stunning particle effects, and unique voice lines make it a standout addition to the game. Whether you're a fan of Ekko or simply appreciate high-quality skins, Pulsefire Ekko is sure to impress.

For more information about Ekko and his various appearances, including the Pulsefire skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website or watch videos on the game's official YouTube channel. Ekko's journey through time is just beginning, and there's no better way to experience it than with the Pulsefire Ekko skin.

Ekko (SKT T1 Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 22, 2016

SKT T1 Ekko is a skin for the champion Ekko in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on April 22, 2016, and is part of the SKT T1 skin line, which celebrates the victories of the professional League of Legends team SK Telecom T1 in the World Championships.

The SKT T1 Ekko skin transforms Ekko into a futuristic, cybernetic version of himself. With sleek silver armor and glowing blue accents, this skin gives Ekko a high-tech and edgy appearance. The skin also includes new visual effects and animations, making it a visually stunning addition to Ekko's arsenal.

As a member of the SK Telecom T1 team, Ekko represents the team's success and dominance in the League of Legends competitive scene. The SKT T1 skins are highly sought after by players and fans alike, as they allow them to show their support for the team and commemorate their achievements.

Ekko, the boy who shattered time, is a versatile champion in League of Legends. He is known for his ability to manipulate time and space, making him a formidable opponent in the game. Ekko's strengths lie in his mobility, burst damage, and crowd control abilities.

One of Ekko's key strengths is his ability to dash around the battlefield with his
(E) ability. This allows him to quickly engage or disengage from fights, making him a slippery target for enemies. Additionally, Ekko's ultimate ability,

(R), allows him to rewind time and heal himself, giving him a second chance in team fights.

Ekko's burst damage comes from his passive ability,
which deals bonus damage after hitting an enemy with three basic attacks or abilities. This allows Ekko to quickly burst down squishy targets and secure kills. His

(Q) ability also deals significant damage, especially when it hits multiple enemies on its return.

In terms of crowd control, Ekko has his

(W) ability, which creates a zone that stuns enemies caught inside after a short delay. This ability can be used to set up plays or escape sticky situations. Ekko's crowd control abilities make him a valuable asset in team fights, as he can disrupt the enemy team and turn the tide of battle.

Despite his strengths, Ekko also has weaknesses that players need to be aware of. One of his main weaknesses is his squishiness. Ekko is a melee champion with low base health, making him vulnerable to burst damage from enemies. Players need to be careful when engaging in fights and make use of Ekko's mobility to avoid taking unnecessary damage.

Another weakness of Ekko is his reliance on landing skill shots. His
(Q) ability and

(W) ability both require precise aiming to maximize their effectiveness. Missing these abilities can significantly reduce Ekko's damage output and crowd control potential.

In terms of Ekko's past in the game, he was released on May 28, 2015, as a champion who excels in hit-and-run tactics and outplaying opponents with his time-manipulating abilities. Ekko quickly became a popular pick in both professional play and solo queue, thanks to his unique playstyle and high skill ceiling.

Ekko's place in the game is primarily as a mid-lane assassin or a jungler. His mobility and burst damage make him a strong pick for roaming and ganking other lanes. Ekko's ability to control fights with his crowd control and ultimate ability also makes him a valuable asset in team compositions.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Ekko, including the SKT T1 Ekko skin. Whether you're a fan of Ekko or a collector of skins, the SKT T1 Ekko skin is a must-have for any League of Legends player.

Ekko (Firelight Ekko)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 2021

Ekko, the boy who shattered time, has always been a fan-favorite champion in League of Legends. With his unique time-manipulating abilities and charismatic personality, Ekko has captured the hearts of players around the world. And now, he is ready to ignite the battlefield with his fiery new skin, Firelight Ekko.

Firelight Ekko is a visually stunning skin that transforms Ekko into a blazing inferno. With fiery red hair, glowing tattoos, and a burning clockwork gauntlet, this skin truly embodies the essence of fire. The particles and effects of Firelight Ekko are also beautifully designed, with flames trailing behind his every move and fiery explosions accompanying his abilities.

One of the standout features of Firelight Ekko is his recall animation. When Ekko recalls, he is engulfed in flames and disappears in a burst of fire, only to reappear in a blaze of glory. It's a visually striking animation that perfectly captures the theme of the skin.

In addition to the stunning visuals, Firelight Ekko also has unique voice lines and interactions. Ekko's voice is infused with a fiery energy, and his quotes reflect his newfound affinity for fire. From taunting his enemies with burning insults to expressing his love for the heat of battle, Ekko's voice lines add an extra layer of immersion to the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story of Ekko and how he came to possess the Firelight Ekko skin. Ekko, whose real name is Ekko Jahan, grew up in the underprivileged district of Zaun. Living in poverty, Ekko had to rely on his wits and street smarts to survive. However, his life changed forever when he stumbled upon a mysterious device called the

The Zero-Drive allowed Ekko to manipulate time, giving him the power to rewind and alter events. With this newfound ability, Ekko became a vigilante, using his powers to fight against injustice in Zaun. He became a symbol of hope for the people, a beacon of light in the darkness of the city.

As Ekko honed his time-manipulating skills, he discovered a new facet of his power â€“ the ability to control fire. This revelation led to the creation of the Firelight Ekko skin, where Ekko harnesses the flames to unleash devastating attacks on his enemies. With his fiery abilities, Ekko becomes an unstoppable force on the battlefield, leaving a trail of destruction in his wake.

In terms of gameplay, Ekko is a versatile champion who excels in both burst damage and mobility. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy. This makes him a formidable threat in both short trades and extended fights.

Ekko's Q ability, Timewinder, sends out a boomerang-like projectile that deals damage to enemies hit on the way out and the way back. It also slows enemies, making it a great tool for kiting and chasing down opponents. His W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a zone that stuns enemies caught inside after a short delay, providing crowd control and setup for his other abilities.

His E ability, Phase Dive, allows Ekko to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking back to his original location. This ability gives him incredible mobility and allows him to quickly engage or disengage from fights. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, allows Ekko to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies. It's a powerful tool that can turn the tide of team fights and make Ekko a difficult champion to kill.

In the world of League of Legends, Ekko is a popular pick in both solo queue and professional play. His ability to outplay opponents with his time-manipulating skills and his high burst damage make him a favorite among skilled players. He is often played in the mid lane or jungle, where his mobility and roaming potential can be fully utilized.

If you want to learn more about Ekko and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find information and videos on our website. From his classic look to his other skins like True Damage Ekko and Project Ekko, there's a skin for every Ekko fan. So, dive into the world of Ekko and experience the thrill of manipulating time with the fiery power of Firelight Ekko.

Ekko (Trick or Treat Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 29, 2015

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

Released on October 29, 2015, this skin offers players a spooky twist on the time-manipulating champion, Ekko. With its Halloween-themed design and eerie animations, Trick or Treat Ekko is a must-have for any Ekko enthusiast looking to add a touch of Halloween spirit to their gameplay.

The Trick or Treat Ekko skin transforms Ekko into a mischievous trickster, ready to haunt the Rift with his time-bending abilities. The skin features Ekko dressed in a playful Halloween costume, complete with a pumpkin-shaped mask, a tattered orange cloak, and a bag full of candy. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, with glowing green accents and a unique recall animation where Ekko pulls out a handful of candy from his bag and tosses it into the air.

Not only does Trick or Treat Ekko offer a visually stunning appearance, but it also enhances the overall gameplay experience. The skin's abilities and animations have been modified to match the Halloween theme. For instance, Ekko's Q ability, Timewinder, now appears as a spinning jack-o'-lantern, while his W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a spooky purple zone on the ground. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, features a ghostly trail as he dashes back in time.

Ekko, the boy who shattered time, is a champion with a rich backstory and a unique playstyle. Hailing from the city of Zaun, Ekko grew up in the harsh environment of the streets, using his wits and time-manipulating abilities to survive. His story is one of resilience and determination, as he seeks to change the course of history and prevent the destruction of his beloved city.

In the game, Ekko is classified as an assassin, excelling at burst damage and mobility. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy. This makes him a formidable threat in skirmishes and team fights. His Q ability, Timewinder, throws a device that deals damage to enemies in its path and returns to Ekko, damaging enemies again. This ability can be used to poke enemies from a distance or clear minion waves quickly.

Ekko's W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a zone that slows enemies and, after a short delay, stuns them. This ability is crucial for setting up plays and catching opponents off guard. His E ability, Phase Dive, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking back to his original location. This ability provides Ekko with excellent mobility and allows him to quickly engage or disengage from fights.

Finally, Ekko's ultimate ability, Chronobreak, is a game-changer. When activated, Ekko dashes back in time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies. This ability not only provides Ekko with a second chance in fights but also allows him to turn the tide of battle in his favor.

Ekko's unique playstyle and versatile kit make him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His ability to manipulate time and outplay opponents with his mobility and burst damage make him a force to be reckoned with. Whether you're looking to make flashy plays or outsmart your opponents, Ekko is a champion that offers endless possibilities.

Ekko (True Damage Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 10, 2019

True Damage Ekko is a stylish and visually stunning skin that was released on November 10, 2019, as part of the True Damage skin line in League of Legends. This skin transforms Ekko, the time-manipulating champion, into a hip-hop artist with a futuristic twist. With its unique animations, sound effects, and visual effects, True Damage Ekko offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

The True Damage skin line was introduced to celebrate the collaboration between Riot Games and various real-world artists, including Becky G, Keke Palmer, Soyeon, DUCKWRTH, and Thutmose. Each member of True Damage represents a different musical genre, and Ekko embodies the spirit of hip-hop in this skin.

True Damage Ekko features a complete redesign of Ekko's appearance, abilities, and animations. He dons a stylish black and gold outfit, complete with a hoodie, baggy pants, and futuristic accessories. The skin also includes new visual effects for his abilities, such as his Chronobreak ultimate, which now showcases a flashy explosion of colors and sound effects.

One of the standout features of True Damage Ekko is the attention to detail in his animations. From his slick dance moves during his recall animation to the way he effortlessly manipulates time with his abilities, every aspect of the skin is meticulously crafted to bring Ekko's hip-hop persona to life.

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a champion in League of Legends known for his time-manipulating abilities and high mobility. He is a versatile champion who can excel in both solo lanes and the jungle. Ekko's unique playstyle revolves around his ability to manipulate time, allowing him to rewind and alter the outcome of fights.

In terms of strengths, Ekko possesses excellent burst damage, mobility, and crowd control. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy. This makes him a formidable threat in skirmishes and team fights.

Ekko's Q ability, Timewinder, is a skillshot that damages enemies in a line and returns to Ekko, dealing additional damage on the way back. This ability provides poke and wave-clear potential, making Ekko a strong laner. His W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a zone that stuns enemies caught inside after a short delay, providing crowd control and setup for his other abilities.

His E ability, Phase Dive, allows Ekko to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking back to his original location. This ability grants him mobility and allows him to quickly engage or disengage from fights. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, allows Ekko to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies upon arrival.

Despite his strengths, Ekko also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to some other champions. Additionally, his abilities have high mana costs, which can limit his ability to spam spells in the early game. Ekko also requires good timing and decision-making to maximize the effectiveness of his ultimate ability.

In the lore of League of Legends, Ekko hails from the city of Zaun, a place of innovation and technological advancement. He grew up in the slums, using his intelligence and resourcefulness to survive. Ekko's fascination with time led him to create a device called the Chronobreak, which allows him to manipulate time and rewind events.

Ekko's story in the game revolves around his desire to change the fate of Zaun and prevent the destruction caused by the ongoing conflicts in the city. He becomes a vigilante, using his time-manipulating abilities to outsmart his enemies and protect the innocent. Ekko's journey is one of self-discovery and the struggle to find his place in a world torn apart by chaos.

True Damage Ekko is just one of the many appearances of this fascinating champion. Ekko (PROJECT: Ekko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 1, 2015

PROJECT: Ekko is a futuristic skin for the champion Ekko in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin is part of the PROJECT skin line, which features champions in a dystopian cybernetic world. With its sleek design and high-tech animations, PROJECT: Ekko offers players a unique and visually stunning experience.

The skin was released on August 1, 2015, and has since become a favorite among Ekko players. Priced at 1350 RP, it offers a significant visual upgrade to the base Ekko skin, making it a worthwhile investment for fans of the champion.

The Story of PROJECT: Ekko

In the PROJECT universe, Ekko is a renegade hacker who fights against the oppressive forces of the PROJECT Corporation. He is a skilled infiltrator and uses his cybernetic abilities to outsmart his enemies. The PROJECT: Ekko skin reflects this narrative, showcasing Ekko as a rebellious hero fighting for freedom.

The skin features Ekko in a sleek, black and blue cybernetic suit, complete with glowing neon accents. His hair is replaced with a futuristic helmet, and his weapon, the Z-Drive, is transformed into a high-tech energy blade. The animations for his abilities are also modified, with futuristic effects and holographic projections.

One of the standout features of the PROJECT: Ekko skin is the recall animation. When Ekko recalls, he activates a holographic projection of himself, creating a decoy to confuse his enemies. This animation not only looks visually impressive but also adds an extra layer of strategy to the skin.

Ekko's Story and Gameplay

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a versatile champion in League of Legends. He is known for his time-manipulating abilities and high mobility, making him a formidable force on the battlefield. Ekko's lore revolves around his past as a street urchin in the city of Zaun and his discovery of a device called the Z-Drive, which allows him to manipulate time.

In the game, Ekko is primarily played as a mid-lane assassin or a jungler. His kit includes a mix of burst damage, crowd control, and mobility. His passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities on an enemy. His Q ability, Timewinder, throws a device that damages enemies on the way out and slows them on the way back. His W ability, Parallel Convergence, creates a field that stuns enemies caught inside after a short delay. His E ability, Phase Dive, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and blinking back to his original location. Finally, his ultimate ability, Chronobreak, allows him to rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Ekko's strengths lie in his ability to burst down squishy targets and escape sticky situations. His mobility and crowd control make him a slippery champion to catch, and his ultimate ability can turn the tide of team fights. However, Ekko is relatively squishy himself and requires precise timing and positioning to maximize his damage output. He also has a high skill ceiling, as his abilities require good decision-making and understanding of his kit.

Ekko has found a place in both casual and competitive play. His unique playstyle and flashy abilities make him an exciting champion to watch and play. In the hands of a skilled player, Ekko can be a game-changer, turning fights in his team's favor with his time-manipulating abilities.

Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a versatile champion in League of Legends. He excels at hit-and-run tactics, using his time-manipulating abilities to outmaneuver his opponents and deal devastating damage. With his Chronobreak ultimate, Ekko can rewind time, healing himself and dealing damage to enemies in the process. This ability makes him a formidable force in team fights and allows him to turn the tide of battle in his favor.

In terms of strengths, Ekko's mobility is unparalleled. His ability to dash through walls with his Phase Dive and blink back in time with his Chronobreak gives him incredible maneuverability, making it difficult for enemies to catch him. Additionally, his passive ability, Z-Drive Resonance, allows him to deal bonus damage after landing three basic attacks or abilities, making him a threat in both short trades and extended fights.

However, Ekko also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his abilities have high mana costs, which can limit his ability to spam skills in the early game. Ekko also requires good timing and decision-making to maximize the effectiveness of his ultimate, as mistimed Chronobreaks can leave him vulnerable or waste the healing potential.

In the lore of League of Legends, Ekko hails from the city of Zaun, a place of innovation and progress. Growing up in the underbelly of the city, Ekko became fascinated with time manipulation and developed his own device, the Z-Drive, which allows him to control time. With his newfound powers, Ekko seeks to change the course of history and create a better future for Zaun.

In the game, Ekko is often played in the mid lane or jungle role. His ability to roam and make plays around the map makes him a strong pick for players who enjoy high mobility and outplay potential. Ekko's playstyle revolves around using his time-manipulating abilities to engage or disengage fights, making him a versatile champion that can adapt to different situations.
